I don't know.
Let me elaborate on the problem I'm trying to solve.
The SparkConf must be initialized before the SparkContext is created. The PrestoSparkRunner accepts the SparkContext itself. The SparkContext must be pre-initialized. This check is needed to enforce that the SparkConf is properly initialized prior creating the SparkContext
